page.title: 18Bird Life
page.content:
Our area is popular with bird watchers at all times of the year. They come to see the{crested tit}and the{Scottish crossbill}and the rare {capercaillie}which lives in the heart of the pine woods.
There is an unusually wide selection of birds within a small radius - birds of the pine woods, of the river, of the moorland and of the hills.
Within a few miles of our area it is possible to see every species of British birds of prey.
The{R.S.P.B}runs a{bird sanctuary}15 kilometres away at{Loch Garten}where the{ospreys}attract a great deal of interest.
